title: Golden jungle tales
brief_description: Includes 3 stories from the Golden Book series. “The Saggy baggy elephant”: a parrot questions the elephant as to who he is, this sparks a journey of discovery into the jungle; “The Tawny scrawny lion”; the jungle animals devise a plan for a jungle free of the noise of the lion chasing animals; “Rupert the rhinoceros”; Rupert needs help, everytime someone comes near him he charges them.
